long_description: The innovative, wearable Hiplok V1.50 Chain Lock transports your bike lock without compromising aesthetics or marking up the frame; beltlike design keeps the weight on the hips, not on the back. 8mm hardened steel chain is encased in sturdy nylon sleeve; 10mm hardened steel shackle secures the padlock and buckle. When worn around the waist, the Hiplok V1.50 Chain Lock is secured like a seatbelt with rip-and-stick adjustments so it is comfortable and easy to remove, not locked in place. Impact reisistant, durable nylon chain sleeve is easy on your bike frame and reflective logo promotes visibility.
short_description: The innovative, wearable Hiplok V1.50 Chain Lock transports your bike lock without compromising aesthetics or marking up the frame; beltlike design keeps the weight on the hips, not on the back.
